divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing outside during both events smoking a cigarette. The first event was About 1 a.m. Sept. 20 and the second event was about 1:45 a.m. Sept. 21, 2013 The first time I noticed a star-like object coming from the North. It was bright and had many flashing lights. It passed overhead and the "split" into two bright lights. They blinked back and forth several times then stopped and hovered for about 5 minutes. Then slowly changed direction and went towards the East. The same exact thing happened last night except this time it was coming from the west and "split up" the objects blinked on and off and then took off toward the North.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
Summary: 2 separate events but I believe the same crafts were involved
